organic.title: Award winning action-RPG ELDEN RING sold 20 million ...
organic.snippet: Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. and FromSoftware, Inc. are pleased to announce that the co-developed action RPG, ELDEN RING, has shipped more than 20 million units worldwide.
